title: Leather Stocking: The Deerslayer and Chingachgook

sources.title: The Deerslayer (1920)
sources.description: Early silent version of James Fenimore Cooper's classic story. It's not the best transfer in the world, and I couldn't find any info on this at IMDB, but according to the information I have, that's Bela Lugosi in the role of Chingachgook. If that's not Bela, it sure looks like him. Runs about 45 minutes.

metadata.Plot: Chingachgook, son of the chief of the Delaware Indian tribe and faithful friend of Hawkeye the Deerslayer is raised by his tribe after being orphaned
metadata.Actors: Emil Mamelok, Herta Heden, Bela Lugosi
